def_cn: （按创作的先后次序排列的某一作曲家的）编号作品（缩略形式为op.）
def_en: An opus is a piece of classical music by a particular composer. Opus is usually followed by a number which indicates at what point the piece was written. The abbreviation op. is also used.

def_cn: 艺术作品；乐曲；著作；画作
def_en: See also:magnum opus; You can refer to an artistic work such as a piece of music or writing or a painting as an opus .
